headline: Reassessing Becton Dickinson (BDX) After Recent Share Price Volatility
summary: If you are wondering whether Becton Dickinson is starting to look like good value, you are not alone. This article will help you frame that question clearly. The stock last closed at US$177.38, with a 3.3% return over the past 7 days, a 14.4% decline over 30 days, and returns of 2.4% over 1 year, a 0.6% decline over 3 years, and 1.3% over 5 years. These mixed returns have come as investors weigh recent company updates and broader sector news, which have kept sentiment in flux. With the share...
